%% Makefile Discovery Algorithm %% Shows the sequence of operations for discovering Makefiles and targets sequenceDiagram participant CLI as CLI participant DS as Discovery Service participant FS as File System participant Make as make command CLI->>DS: DiscoverMakefiles(Groupware_KanbanBoard) rect rgb(Groupware_KanbanBoard) Note over DS,FS: Step 1: Create temp Makefile DS->>FS: Create temp file with
_list_makefiles target FS-->>DS: temp path end rect rgb(Groupware_KanbanBoard) Note over DS,Make: Step 2: Execute make DS->>Make: make -f temp -f Makefile
_list_makefiles Make-->>DS: MAKEFILE_LIST output DS->>FS: Delete temp file end rect rgb(Groupware_WikiPage) Note over DS: Step 3: Parse output DS->>DS: Parse file paths
Filter temp file
Resolve to absolute end DS-->>CLI: [Groupware_ChatRoom]string file paths CLI->>DS: DiscoverTargets(Groupware_WikiPage) rect rgb(Groupware_KanbanBoard) Note over DS,Make: Parse make database DS->>Make: make -p -f Makefile
(Groupware_WikiPage) Make-->>DS: Database output DS->>DS: Extract targets
Parse .PHONY
Parse dependencies end DS-->>CLI: DiscoverTargetsResult
